# Background
Mor Ndiaye is a agricultural engineer specialized in soil science. He is very passioned by the use of cutting edge technology in agriculture and soil science field. In order to make his skills up to date he learns day by day news skills such as remote sensing spatial data science ect. At the end,the main goal for he strength her skill is to contribute into the enhancement of agriculture.He show a deep commitment for the improvement of the resilience of smallholders famers (in rural area in Senegal ) who faced new challenge such as climate change rapid growing of demography and so on.
